name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
role_name: Senior Software Engineer (with overlap into ML Engineer)
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of experience in developing scalable and high-performance applications, utilizing a diverse **tech stack** including **Python**, **Google Cloud Platform** (GKE, BigQuery, BigTable, GCS, Dataproc, VertexAI), **MongoDB**, **Redis**, **Spark**, **TensorFlow**, **Grafana**, **Sentry**, **Gitlab**, **Jira**, **Productboard**, and **PagerDuty**. Proficient in implementing **MLOps** practices with hands-on experience in **Kubeflow**, **Airflow**, and **Prefect**, I excel at creating machine learning pipelines and serving models in production environments.

My expertise in **CI/CD** automation and microservices architecture ensures the delivery of robust, secure applications in compliance with industry standards. I have successfully led projects integrating AI/ML capabilities within sectors such as healthcare and finance, delivering real-time analytics and intelligent automation solutions. My solid foundation in event-driven systems and a focus on continuous improvement position me well to contribute effectively as both a software and machine learning engineer.
